prompt: Generate realistic text messages that represent non-spam (ham) content. These messages should reflect a broad spectrum of everyday communication, including personal conversations, legitimate business or service notifications, casual updates, and automated alerts. Vary the tone (friendly, professional, neutral, concerned), language style (informal chats, formal announcements, concise or detailed), and topics (meeting or appointment reminders, family or friend check-ins, order or delivery confirmations, bank transaction alerts, community or event updates). Include diverse formats like quick one-word replies, detailed explanations, friendly greetings, or automated system messages (e.g., OTP codes, subscription reminders). Ensure the content simulates authentic, non-malicious communication across different contexts, relationships, and platforms, avoiding any deceptive or promotional undertones.
response:
Hey! Just checking in to see how you’re doing.  
Don't forget about our meeting tomorrow at 3 PM. Looking forward to it!  
Your order has been shipped and is expected to arrive by Friday.  
Hi Mom, I’ll be at the family dinner this Sunday! Can’t wait to see everyone.  
Can you please send me the report by EOD? Thanks!  
Reminder: Your subscription will renew on the 15th.  
I just transferred the funds. Please check your account.  
Hey! Want to grab coffee this weekend?  
Your appointment is confirmed for Monday at 10 AM.  
Just wanted to say I really enjoyed our chat yesterday.  
Please enter the OTP code: 123456 to complete your login.  
The community picnic is scheduled for next Saturday at the park.  
Is everything okay? I haven’t heard from you in a while.  
Thanks for your help with the project! I really appreciate it.  
Your package has been delivered. Check your front door!  
Looking forward to seeing you at the concert next week!  
Don’t forget to pay the electricity bill by the 20th.  
I’m running late, but I’ll be there in 10 minutes!  
Hey, just wanted to remind you about the book club this Thursday.  
Your feedback is important to us! Please take a moment to complete our survey.  
It was great catching up with you last night!  
The gym will be closed for maintenance on Monday.  
Just a heads-up, the traffic is really bad today.  
I booked the tickets for the movie! Can’t wait!  
Can you confirm if you’ll be attending the meeting tomorrow?  
Your account statement is ready for review.  
Thanks for the invite! I’ll be there with bells on.  
Don’t forget to bring your ID for the event.  
I’m so proud of you for finishing your project!  
The weather looks great for our hike this weekend.  
Your password has been successfully changed.  
Just checking in to see how your new job is going.  
I’ll send you the details for the project later today.  
The delivery service will arrive between 2 PM and 4 PM.  
Hope you’re having a good day! Let’s chat soon.  
The kids had a blast at the park today!  
Your appointment has been rescheduled to Wednesday at 2 PM.  
Looking forward to our vacation next month!  
I received your message and will get back to you shortly.  
Just wanted to say thank you for your support during the tough time.  
Your bank statement is available online for review.  
I’ll take care of dinner tonight; what do you feel like eating?  
The event has been postponed to next month.  
I’m here if you need to talk about anything.  
Congratulations on your promotion! You deserve it!  
I’ll be out of the office next week, but I’ll check my emails periodically.  
Your feedback on the recent meeting would be appreciated.  
I’m excited for the road trip! Let’s finalize our plans soon.  
Just finished the book you recommended—such a great read!  
The sale ends tomorrow, don’t miss out!  
I’ll pick you up at 6 for dinner.  
Thanks for sending over the documents! They look good.  
Just a reminder to submit your timesheet by Friday.  
Looking forward to seeing you at the family reunion!
